00014 #ifndef DATATABLESELEC_H
00015 #define DATATABLESELEC_H

00020 #include "ItemComboTable.h"

00022 #include <memory>
00023 #include <typeinfo>
00024 
00029 template <typename DataType, typename TableType = std::map<uint32, DataType> >
00030 class SelectableDataTable: public DataTable<DataType, TableType> 
00031 {
00032 public:
00033    typedef TableType table_t;
00035    explicit SelectableDataTable( uint32 bits = 0);
00036    virtual ~SelectableDataTable() { }
00037 
00038 
00045    void setValues( const table_t& values );
00046 
00048    void setValues( const DataType &defaultVal, 
00049                    const table_t& values );
00050 
00052    void load( DataBuffer& data );
00054    void save( DataBuffer& data ) const;
00056    const DataType& getData( uint32 index ) const;
00058    uint32 getSizeInDataBuffer() const;
00059 
00062    void select( uint32 bits );
00064    uint32 getNbrOfBitsInIndex() const;
00065 
00066 private:
00068    SelectableDataTable( const SelectableDataTable<DataType>& );
00070    SelectableDataTable<DataType> &operator = 
00071                                      ( const SelectableDataTable<DataType>& );
00072 
00073    std::auto_ptr< DataTable<DataType> > m_dataTable; 
00074 };

00076 
00077 
00078 template <typename DataType, typename TableType>
00079 SelectableDataTable<DataType, TableType>::SelectableDataTable( uint32 bits ) 
00080 {
00081    select( bits );
00082 }
00083 
00084 template <typename DataType, typename TableType>
00085 void
00086 SelectableDataTable<DataType, TableType>::
00087 setValues( const TableType& values )
00088 {
00089    std::map<DataType, uint32> combos;
00090    ItemComboTable< DataType, uint8 >::getCombinations( values, combos );
00091    // determine how many bits we need for index
00092    uint8 bits = 0;
00093    if ( combos.size() > 0xFFFF ) {
00094       bits = 32;
00095    } else if ( combos.size() < 0xFF ) {
00096       bits = 8;
00097    } else {
00098       bits = 16;
00099    }
00100 
00101    // calculate default value
00102    typename TableType::value_type def =
00103       ItemComboTable< DataType, uint8 >::getBestDefaultValue( values );
00104 
00105    // determine if we should use ItemDataTable instead of ItemComboTable
00106    uint32 nbrDefaults = def.first;
00107    uint32 nbrNonDefaults = values.size() - nbrDefaults;
00108    uint32 sizeOfDataTable = nbrNonDefaults * ( sizeof( DataType ) +  
00109                                                sizeof( uint32 ) );
00110    uint32 sizeOfComboTable = 
00111       nbrNonDefaults * (  bits / 8 + sizeof( uint32 ) ) +
00112       combos.size() * sizeof( DataType );
00113       
00114 
00115    if ( sizeOfDataTable < sizeOfComboTable ) {
00116       bits = 0; // use ItemDataTable
00117    }
00118 
00119    select( bits );
00120 
00121    setValues( def.second, values );
00122 }
00123 
00124 template <typename DataType, typename TableType>
00125 void
00126 SelectableDataTable<DataType, TableType>::
00127 setValues( const DataType &defaultVal, 
00128            const table_t& values ) 
00129 {
00130    m_dataTable->setValues( defaultVal, values );
00131 }
00132 
00133 template <typename DataType, typename TableType>
00134 void 
00135 SelectableDataTable<DataType, TableType>::
00136 load( DataBuffer& data ) 
00137 {
00138    uint32 bits = data.readNextLong();
00139    mc2dbg << "[SelectableDT] Loading index with " << bits << " bits " << endl;
00140    select( bits );
00141    m_dataTable->load( data );
00142 }
00143 
00144 template <typename DataType, typename TableType>
00145 void 
00146 SelectableDataTable<DataType, TableType>::
00147 save( DataBuffer& data )  const
00148 {
00149    uint32 bits = getNbrOfBitsInIndex();
00150    mc2dbg << "[SelectableDT] saving index with " << bits << " bits " << endl;
00151    data.writeNextLong( bits );
00152    m_dataTable->save( data );
00153 }
00154 
00155 template <typename DataType, typename TableType>
00156 const DataType& 
00157 SelectableDataTable<DataType, TableType>::
00158 getData( uint32 index ) const
00159 {
00160    return m_dataTable->getData( index );
00161 }
00162 
00163 template <typename DataType, typename TableType>
00164 uint32 SelectableDataTable<DataType, TableType>::
00165 getSizeInDataBuffer() const 
00166 {
00167    // four extra for bits in index 
00168    return m_dataTable->getSizeInDataBuffer() + 4;
00169 }
00170 
00171 template <typename DataType, typename TableType>
00172 void SelectableDataTable<DataType, TableType>::
00173 select( uint32 bits ) 
00174 {
00175    switch ( bits ) {
00176    case 0:
00177       m_dataTable.reset( new ItemDataTable<DataType>( DataType() ) );
00178       break;
00179    case 8:
00180       m_dataTable.reset( new ItemComboTable<DataType, uint8>() );
00181       break;
00182    case 16:
00183       m_dataTable.reset( new ItemComboTable<DataType, uint16>() );
00184       break;
00185    case 32:
00186       m_dataTable.reset( new ItemComboTable<DataType, uint32>() );
00187       break;
00188    default:
00189       // should throw something, but the rest of the code is not ready....
00190       mc2dbg << "Can not create DataTable<DataType> with " << bits 
00191              << " bits" << endl;
00192       break;
00193    }
00194 }
00195 
00196 template <typename DataType, typename TableType>
00197 uint32 
00198 SelectableDataTable<DataType, TableType>::
00199 getNbrOfBitsInIndex() const 
00200 {
00201    if ( typeid( *m_dataTable.get() ) == 
00202         typeid( ItemDataTable<DataType> ) ) {
00203       return 0;
00204    } else if ( typeid( *m_dataTable.get() ) ==
00205                typeid( ItemComboTable< DataType, uint8 > ) ) {
00206       return 8;
00207    } else if ( typeid( *m_dataTable.get() ) ==
00208                typeid( ItemComboTable< DataType, uint16 > ) ) {
00209       return 16;
00210    } else if ( typeid( *m_dataTable.get() ) ==
00211                typeid( ItemComboTable< DataType, uint32 > ) ) {
00212       return 32;
00213    }
00214    // should throw...
00215    return -1;
00216 }
